text: Aur yaad karo Isa ibn-e-Maryam ki woh baat jo usne kahi thi ke â€œAey bani Israel, main tumhari taraf Allah ka bheja hua Rasool hoon, Tasdeeq (verify/confirm) karne wala hoon us Taurat ki jo mujhse pehle aayi hui maujood hai, aur basharat (khushkhabri) dene wala hoon ek rasool ki jo mere baad aayega jiska naam Ahmed hoga. Magar jab woh unke paas khuli khuli nishaniyan lekar aaya to unhon ne kaha yeh to sareeh dhoka hai
